name: Fruity Boi
description:
This game was developed as a way to get acquainted with PICO-8 and learn it's basics.  Made in under 24 hours back in September of 2017.

The game works and has a win condition, which is a victory in itself! PICO-8 was so much fun, challenging and very rewarding.

Developed by the Sankaku Games' team:
Ines Merino & Franciso Murias
